Notes: Based on William Shakespeare's comedy The Taming of the Shrew
Guest Appearance- Remake of Gol Maal
Remake of Joroo Ka Ghulam and paired with (Actress Vidhyasree)
Story by T. S. Nagabharana- Based on Happy Go Lovely
2nd half based on Apna Desh( which was a remake of Kathanayakudu (1969 film) and also remade as Nam Naadu (1969 film))
Based on novel of same name by Veerappa Moily
Based on Tum Haseen Main Jawaan
Remake of Hindi film Padosan which itself is based on a Bengali story Pasher Bari by Arun Chowdhury
